data.title: The Sutton Place Hotel Vancouver
data.meta_description: With residential living at La Grande Résidence, these furnished suites are steps away in a private building, adjacent to The Sutton Place Hotel Vancouver.
data.text:
This is the epitome of living in luxury. And, it certainly redefines home-away-from-home living. When you have always expected the utmost in an elevated lifestyle, choosing to stay at La Grande Résidence just makes sense. This is one of downtown Vancouver’s premier addresses. You’re right in the heart of the city. In fact, mere steps from the finest shopping, arts and entertainment districts. Not too far away are Stanley Park, Granville Island, the historic Orpheum Theatre, Rogers Arena, and so much more that make this the perfect place to be. Not to mention the variety of eclectic restaurants, including the world-renowned Boulevard Kitchen & Oyster Bar at The Sutton Place Hotel Vancouver.

You have reached the pinnacle of living, with the very best elements of The Sutton Place Hotel Vancouver right at your fingertips, from the privacy of your building right next door.

Experience a lifestyle that is distinctly your own. One and two-bedroom stylishly furnished suites that really are a cut above the rest and inspired by charming French décor. A spacious balcony gives you all the views you could hope for, and the kitchen is adorned with marble countertops and caters to your every culinary need with high-end Miele appliances. To further exceed your expectations, full maid service is available upon request, personal concierge, state-of-the-art business centre, and laundry services, too.

Now is the time to live the very best premium lifestyle.
